video_title: If it helped Kobe Bryant… wouldn’t you say trying it for yourself is at least worth a shot? 👀🏀💯
transcript:
Kobe Ryan's a perfect example he was
known for being like hardcore obsessed
with playing basketball and he would
wake up and be at the gym at almost
every single morning at 4:00 a.m. and
what he did was he would celebrate
himself he was proud of himself knowing
that he was at the gym when all of his
competition was sleeping and so
throughout the entire two or thre hour
workout he's thinking to himself this is
amazing I'm going to beat everybody I'm
going to be the best basketball player
that ever existed and so what happened
was he set up a dopamine reward system
about showing up at four o'clock in the
morning and guess what he did showed up
the next day at 4:00 in the morning and
the next day
